source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: Heal Your Kitchen, Heal Your Body

visible_instructors.title: Loa Blasucci
visible_instructors.job_title: Wellness Expert, Energy Medicine Practitioner, Nutritionist
visible_instructors.name: Loa

items.headline: How to Create a Kitchen That Heals You
objectives_summary: To create a healing space in your home kitchen, designed to up level your vitality and health.
With some strategic, simple changes, your kitchen can prevent diseases, such as dementia, cancer, diabetes, and obesity.
How to get rid of what is making you sick, tired, or fat.

items.title: Craft Cocktails
items.headline: An in depth look at classic cocktails and their relatives
objectives_summary: Bartending, mixology, cocktails, and liquor

items.title: Healthy Sushi Course For Beginners By Sushi Lovers
items.headline: Learn How To Make Better Sushi Then Your Local Sushi Shop
objectives_summary: What tools do you need for making SUSHI
What ingredients do you need and how to prepare them
How to make Sushi Vinegar

items.title: Layer Cake From Scratch: Ultimate Beginners Guide
items.headline: Learn how to make and decorate a professional layer cake from scratch!
objectives_summary: How to make a professional layer cake
Cake decorating
How to bake a cake

items.title: Sushi Masterclass by Award-Winning Culinary Academy

visible_instructors.job_title: Japanese Cuisine Masterclass by master chefs
visible_instructors.name: Kazumi

items.headline: The Most-Detailed Step-by-Step Tutorial that you can never find anywhere else
objectives_summary: The art of sushi: from roll to nigiri
Learn how to prepare fish, sushi rice and more!

items.title: Cook Indian Food-Restaurant Favorites
items.headline: Delicious Indian restaurant favorite recipes, made fresh at home with detailed step by step videos
objectives_summary: Make top restaurant favorite Indian dishes with step by step, detailed recipes
Confidently create new dishes on your own, and use food as an expression of your culinary creativity
Over 25 recipes all in one convenient place

items.title: Juice Cleansing for Weight Loss, Intestine and Liver Repair!

visible_instructors.title: Scott Brown
visible_instructors.job_title: Major State University Finance Professor, Investments Expert
visible_instructors.name: Scott

items.headline: Break food craving cycles while repairing your intestinal tract and resting your liver with super nutrition weight loss.
objectives_summary: Juice cleansing feeds you as it clears the intestinal tract — unlike water colon cleanses that do nothing or are harmful (as reported by the Mayo Clinic).
Learn from two juicers who have been there and done that.
Enjoy an energy increase in the 4th or 5th day.

items.title: Macarons 2.0: baking 4 types of shells + 15 fillings!
items.headline: Learn all secrets of macarons. 21 video lessons. 4 hours.
objectives_summary: Learn 4 types of macarons (shells).
Learn to color shells without color powders and give them a flavor, as well as make additional garnish.
Get a ready range of flavors: 15 various fillings.

items.title: Dad is cooking!
items.headline: Simple cooking ideas and a survival kit for single parents with little time
objectives_summary: You will save time and energy
You will be less stressed out about cooking a meal
You will save money by planning in advance

items.title: The Easy-Going Mother Dough Guide
items.headline: All you should know about Sourdough, theory and practice of Natural Leavening Baking
objectives_summary: How to create and develop a Mother Dough or Sour Dough
How to maintain and refresh any Sour Dough
How to bake a Sour Dough Bread Loaf

items.title: A Complete Guide to Chocolate Decor
items.headline: From simple figures to works of art
objectives_summary: Work with chocolate, make gorgeous decorations for desserts, experiment with forms and textures

items.title: Foundations of Viticulture - Understanding How Wine is Grown

visible_instructors.title: Ryan Vet
visible_instructors.job_title: Entreprenuer, TV Host, Speaker, Author and Sommelier
visible_instructors.name: Ryan

items.headline: The ultimate prep course for viticulture taught by celebrity sommelier, Ryan Vet
objectives_summary: Learn viticulture - the science of how wine is grown
Prep for key exam questions in viticulture if you plan to take WSET, CMS, SWE or other wine certifications
Understand the lifecycle of the vitis vinifera vine (the wine grape-producing vine)

items.title: Éclairs: 101 secrets of pâte à choux
items.headline: You will know all secrets of éclairs and all nuances of work with pâte à choux
objectives_summary: 6 types of éclairs with different fillings, up to 20 variations of flavor!
You will learn to control and interpret correctly your cooking results.
Study online at a convenient time and anywhere in the world

items.title: TLC Drinks: Bartending and Mixology 101
items.headline: Basic Bar Knowledge and Mixology Skills
objectives_summary: Bartending, mixology, cocktails, and liquor

items.title: Vegan Cooking - Learn Easy And Delicious Vegan Recipes
items.headline: Vegan cooking mastery! Create simple, delicious, vegan recipes for beginners. Step-by-step.
objectives_summary: Be able to cook healthy, delicious vegan food
Be able to make vegan appetizers, entrees, and desserts
Be able to cook vegan recipes to your family and friends

items.title: Pizza Making - Bake The Best Pizzas At Home!
items.headline: Sourdough Pizza Bases, Basic Pizza Bases, Pizza Sauce & Pizza Toppings!
objectives_summary: How to make pizza dough in this course by hand, so you don't have to purchase expensive equipment!
How To Cook Perfect Pizza In Your Home Oven, no more getting the mass produced pizza bases from the grocery store.
How to make the perfect Napoli pizza base sauce, recipe included in a PDF attachment.
